name: 伊班·马雷罗
introduction: Born in Barcelona Spain in 1976, grew up in between Dominican Republic and NYC, started in TV as a TvHost in various Program as (Night Profile, Santo Domingo a Night), in 2014 jumps to the big screen prior this has acting studios in Madrid, Tarragona, Dominican Republic and NYC, took clases as stunt, former Air Force Lieutenant, makes him a First-hand weapon Knowledges.Took Various clases with different acting coaches like, Manny Perez, Juan Fernandez and Katherine Montes.Playing various roles in different movies, Police Officer, DEA, Hitman, Biker, Doctor, Security Guard, banker, Father and also Worked in TV comercial for different brands and products.
